dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: What brings you to this land?

dialogues.speaker: Guard
dialogues.text: We've been expecting you. The kingdom is in peril.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: How can I help the kingdom?

dialogues.speaker: Guard
dialogues.text: Our king has been kidnapped by a dark sorcerer. We need brave adventurers like yourself to rescue him.
